trans-unit.source: Control that is used to separate items in items controls.
trans-unit.target: 用來分隔項目中的項目控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Separator control draws a line, horizontal or vertical, between items in controls, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符號控制項可繪製線條、 水平或垂直、 在控制項中，項目之間例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Separator controls do not react to any keyboard, mouse, mouse wheel, or tablet input and cannot be enabled or selected.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符號控制項不回應任何鍵盤、 滑鼠、 滑鼠滾輪或平板電腦輸入，並不能啟用或選取。

trans-unit.source: Separator controls inside <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> elements appear differently from Separator controls outside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符號控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>項目會出現不同的外部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>分隔符號控制項</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> with a Separator, the control automatically applies the <xref:System.Windows.Style> identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>以分隔符號，控制項會自動套用<xref:System.Windows.Style>由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Styles are placed in resource dictionaries and are searched for by their keys.
trans-unit.target: 樣式會放置在資源字典中，並依其索引鍵中搜尋。

trans-unit.source: To change the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a Separator inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to create your new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更<xref:System.Windows.Style>的一個分隔符號內<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，您必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要建立您新的<xref:System.Windows.Style>。</xref:System.Windows.Style>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu></xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Separator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Separator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供適當<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SeparatorAutomationPeer"></xref>實作此控制項，做為一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]自動化基礎結構。
